actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Collection Act of 1992 to extend the authorization of the Assassination Records Review Board until September 30, 1998.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Collection Act of 1992 to: (1) extend the termination date of the Assassination Records Review Board through September 30, 1998; and (2) authorize appropriations for FY 1998.

titles.title: A bill to amend the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Collection Act of 1992 to extend the authorization of the Assassination Records Review Board until September 30, 1998.
